quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: Alice Johnson

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Emily Davis

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Michael White

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Sophia Brown

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: David Lee

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilson

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Matthew Clark

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Ella Turner

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: William Harris

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Grace Robinson

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Daniel Evans

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Sophie Turner

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Alexander Martin

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Emma Baker

quotes.text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: James Hall

quotes.text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk. In a world that's changing quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Ava Walker

quotes.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Benjamin Cook

quotes.text: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
quotes.author: Lucy Turner

quotes.text: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.author: Jacob King

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Zoe Adams

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Oliver Wright

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Charlotte Green

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Noah Parker
